required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: A Phase II, Single Arm, Multicenter and Open Labelstudy Evaluating the Efficacy, Safety and Pharmacokinetics of HMPL-453 in Patient With Advanced Malignant Mesothelioma

brief_summary.textblock: This is a phase II, single arm, multicenter and open-label study to evaluate the efficacy, safety and pharmacokinetic of HMPL-453 in patient with advanced Malignant Mesothelioma

detailed_description.textblock: Histologically confirmed patients with advanced malignant mesothelioma that who was failure of the first -line systemic therapy

primary_outcome.time_frame: measured up to 6 months after the last subject has been enrolled or all subjects have finished their last PFS follow up, whichever comes first
primary_outcome.description: Evaluating ORR of HMPL-453 in patient with advanced malignant mesothelioma

secondary_outcome.time_frame: measured up to 6 months after the last subject has been enrolled or all subjects have finished their last PFS follow up, whichever comes first
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluating DCR of HMPL-453 in patient with advanced malignant mesothelioma
Evaluating 12 weeks DCR of HMPL-453 in patient with advanced malignant mesothelioma
Evaluating TTR of HMPL-453 in patient who achieved partial response or complete response according to RECIST 1.1 or mRECIST 1.1
Evaluating DoR of HMPL-453 in patient from subject first achieve a complete remission, or partial remission to patient PD, or death whichever comes first.
Evaluating 12 weeks PFS rate of HMPL-453 in patient with advanced malignant mesothelioma
Evaluating PFS of HMPL-453 in patient with advanced malignant mesothelioma.
Evaluating OS of HMPL-453 in patient with advanced malignant mesothelioma

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Measured from the first dose to within 30 days after the end of treatment.
secondary_outcome.description: The safety endpoints include adverse events (AEs) and serious adverse events (SAEs). Reporting of safety, extent of exposure, concomitant medications and discontinuation of study therapy will be based on all subjects who received at least 1 dose of treatment. The adverse events will be registered according to NCI CTCAE 5.0.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: measured on Cycle 1 day 15 and day 16
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluating Cmax of Continuous dosing of HMPL-453 in patient with advanced malignant

secondary_outcome.measure: The time to Cmax (Tmax) of HMPL-453
secondary_outcome.time_frame: measured on Cycle 1 day 15 and day 16
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluating Tmax of Continuous dosing of HMPL-453 in patient with advanced malignant

secondary_outcome.measure: The area under the plasma concentration-time curve (AUC) of HMPL-453
secondary_outcome.time_frame: measured on Cycle 1 day 15 and day 16
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluating AUC from 0 to the time of the last measurable concentration of HMPL-453 in patient with advanced malignant
